title: Italy Money Supply M2
description: Money Supply M2 in Italy decreased to 1919341 EUR Million in September from 1924971 EUR Million in August of 2022. Money Supply M2 in Italy averaged 805996.35 EUR Million from 1980 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1949499 EUR Million in July of 2022 and a record low of 132635 EUR Million in February of 1980. Italy Money Supply M2 includes M1 plus short-term time deposits in banks. This page provides - Italy Money Supply M2 - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banca d'Italia
